field.filter: SELECT MedicalDeviceMIE AS mie WHERE mie.org_id = :this->org_id
SELECT IPAddress AS ip JOIN Organization AS child ON ip.org_id = child.id JOIN Organization AS root ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id WHERE root.id = :this->org_id
SELECT MedicalModel WHERE medicalbrand_id = :this->medicalbrand_id AND type = :this->finalclass

profile.name: Medical Device Manager
profile.description: Person dealing with medical devices - Admin Level
